price: Inilah hari keputusan 1275 yang kamu selalu mendustakannya 1276.
arabic: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
footnotes:
1275.  "Hari keputusan" maksudnya ialah hari Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā memberi keputusan dan pembalasan kepada hamba-Nya.
1276.  Ayat 20 adalah percakapan yang terjadi antara sesama orang-orang kafir.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hādhā yawmu al-faṣli alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
